body_html:
@vlasenkov i find that EXTREMELY weird as well, that during cmake test program, but not when running tests.

one reason for this might be that when torch is import torch, it will try to import numpy as well.

If numpy is loaded first, and it is linked against another BLAS which has a extern float sdot_(), that symbol is probably loaded first into the process, and so our compile-time checks become meaningless. You can check for this by running the otool -L utility on the numpy librarie's .so files.
